body.name: Hefty Party On Disposable Plastic Cups, Assorted, 16 Ounce, 100 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 44 mins
features: ASSORTED PARTY CUPS: This package includes 100 count 16 ounce Hefty Party on disposable cups in assorted colors.
No.1 PARTY CUPS IN AMERICA: The iconic cold cup you know & love, backed by Hefty durability & design
EASY-TO-GRIP: Like a solid handshake, these party cups have a grip you can respect thanks to the innovative design that makes them easy to hold
TOUGHNESS YOU CAN TRUST: Dependably strong and durable, these plastic party cups hold cup after cup of your favorite beverages
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We want you to be happy with your purchase. If you have any issues with our cups, contact us via the hotline number on the back of the package so we can help
body.description: Hefty Party On! Disposable Plastic Cups take all the fuss and mess out of entertaining while adding vibrant color and hassle-free cleanup to your gathering. Get a confident hold on these plastic cups with their easy-to-grip design that helps keep your drink in-hand and not all over your carpet. Hefty plastic party cups feature dependable durability to stand up to cup after cup of your favorite beverages, art supplies and more. Hefty disposable plastic cups simplify cleanup, saving you the time and energy involved in washing countless glasses, so you have more time for relaxing with loved ones. Product: Not yet recyclable, not compostable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than Solo!
reviews.reviewText: Hefty plastic cups have become a staple in my household, and for good reason. These cups effortlessly combine durability, convenience, and affordability, making them a reliable choice for various occasions.The first standout feature is the sturdiness of these cups. Whether filled with a refreshing beverage or used for snacks, the cups hold up impressively well. The high-quality plastic resists cracking and bending, ensuring that they reliably withstand the demands of everyday use.The stackable design adds a practical touch, allowing for easy storage in cabinets or pantries. This space-saving feature is especially appreciated when preparing for gatherings or events where having an ample supply of cups is essential.The versatility of Hefty plastic cups is another noteworthy aspect. Whether it's a casual family picnic, a birthday celebration, or a weekend barbecue, these cups seamlessly adapt to various settings. The colorful design adds a touch of fun, making them suitable for many occasions.The convenience factor extends to cleanup as well. The disposable nature of these cups eliminates the need for extensive washing after use. This not only saves time but also makes them an eco-friendly alternative to traditional glassware when recycling facilities are available.Affordability is a key selling point. Hefty plastic cups offer a cost-effective solution for hosting gatherings without compromising on quality. The bulk packaging options further enhance the value, ensuring that you have an ample supply on hand for any event.While some may argue against the environmental impact of disposable products, Hefty has taken steps towards sustainability, incorporating recycled materials into their products. This eco-conscious approach adds a positive dimension to the overall appeal of their plastic cups.In conclusion, Hefty plastic cups deliver a winning combination of durability, versatility, and affordability. Whether you're hosting a party or simply need reliable cups for everyday use, these cups prove to be a practical and dependable choice, making them a staple in my household.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these cups for my grandson birthday party, and they were a hit. The cups are colorful, sturdy, and easy to hold. They come in four different colors: red, blue, green, and yellow. They are perfect for serving drinks, snacks, or desserts. They can also be used for games or crafts. The cups are disposable, so there is no hassle of washing or storing them. They are also recyclable, which is good for the environment. These cups are great for any occasion, whether it is a party, a picnic, or a family gathering. They are also very affordable and offer good value for money. I paid $6.64 for the 100-count pack, which works out to $0.07 per cup. That is much cheaper than other brands that charge more for less cups. I would highly recommend these cups to anyone who is looking for a fun and convenient way to serve drinks or food. They are durable, versatile, and stylish. They are one of the best purchases I have ever made on Amazon. I hope this review helps you decide whether to buy these cups or not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant colors for such a cool cup!
reviews.reviewText: Hefty Party On Disposable Plastic Cups are a fantastic choice for any gathering or event. These cups offer a perfect balance of convenience, durability, and style that make them a go-to option for party hosts.One of the standout features of Hefty Party On cups is their sturdiness. Made from high-quality, durable plastic, these cups can withstand the demands of any party.Whether you're serving cold beverages or hosting a game of beer pong, these cups hold up exceptionally well, minimizing the risk of spills and leaks. Another major advantage of these cups is their convenience. Being disposable, they eliminate the hassle of post-party cleanup. Once the event is over, simply toss them away, saving you time and effort. This makes Hefty Party On cups an excellent choice for large gatherings where convenience is a top priority.Additionally, these cups are stackable, making them easy to store and transport. Whether you're packing them for a picnic or storing them in your pantry, the stackable design helps save valuable space.Lastly, Hefty Party On Disposable Plastic Cups are an affordable option that doesn't compromise on quality. With their durability and versatility, these cups provide excellent value for the price. Cheers to Hefty for providing top-notch disposable cups that deliver on both functionality and style!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great colors and they are the right size
reviews.reviewText: Good value and cups don’t crack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Thin Walls
reviews.reviewText: The colors were great!I know that these are disposable cups but I was very iffy of how thin the walls of the cups were. I could also see where the seam of the cup was and it was very weak. I have purchased cups before and had no problem, but this was definitely a bad batch. Would think about it before buying again, but not enough to stop me from purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Cups! Wrong colors 😔
reviews.reviewText: I love these cups & have ordered them multiple times. With a teenager in the home and all of her friends that visit, its hard to keep plastic cups for long. These are the perfect solution. I don't have to worry about missing cups anymore with these disposable ones. My only complaint is that while I've always received the cups in the vibrant colors shown above, today I received a pack with red, green, gold and silver. I suppose they match the season but the other colors are much more fun. Its not at all a deal breaker, though. I did deduct a star for that. Otherwise, these are 5 star all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great party cups
reviews.reviewText: Very affordable party cups that are sturdy and durable. I will continue to buy these and you can't beat the price. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the colors and could not find that in stores. great price for all you get
These cups are top notch! Great color selection and cheaper than Solo Cups.
out of several brands tried at our workplace, this disposable cup has worked the best.
None of them were broken and the colors are nice
Room enough to have a large hot beverage and add milk or whipped cream
Kids loved the vibrant colors..good price in comparison to others of this type..
